PageWidgetPortable.Title: Filtros
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>Z_FILTROS.CUSTOM.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.USUARIO=@USUARIO AND A.TABELA=(SELECT HANDLE FROM Z_TABELAS WHERE NOME = 'FN_DOCUMENTOS')</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/Administracao/FiltroPadrao/ZFiltrosPageForm.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
